text: Michel Hessmann (born 6 April 2001) is a German professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . ==Major results== ;2018 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Junior Road Championships : 4th Time trial, UCI Junior Road World Championships : 4th Time trial, UEC European Junior Road Championships : 4th Johan Museeuw Classic : 6th Overall Trophée Centre Morbihan : 7th Overall Saarland Trofeo : 9th Overall Giro della Lunigiana ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2019 : 1st 20px Overall Trophée Centre Morbihan ::1st Stage 2 (ITT) : National Junior Road Championships ::2nd Time trial ::2nd Road race : 4th Overall Course de la Paix Juniors : 5th Time trial, UCI Junior Road World Championships : 5th Overall Giro della Lunigiana : 5th GP Luxembourg : 7th Trofeo Emilio Paganessi ;2020 : 1st 20px XCO, National Under–23 Mountainbike Championships : UEC European Road Championships ::1st 20px Mixed team relay ::6th Time trial U23 : 10th Overall Müller - Die lila Logistik Rad-Bundesliga ::1st Ilsfeld-Auenstein ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:German male cyclists
title: Michel Hessmann
